title: HMS Brave Swordsman
creator_credit: Searchlight Films, Stanley A Young, Bernard Purcell and Arnold Louis Miller
brief_description: HMS Brave Swordsman is an advanced new type patrol boat. It is shown participating in a high speed trial and torpedo firing practice.
